house_listing.house_description: This single family home has 4 bedroom(s), 5 bath(s) , 2 car garage. Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, patio, fireplace.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Breakfast Room, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, CeilingFan(s), Dining/Living Combo, Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, KitchenIsland, Microwave, Pantry, Ranch Style
